title: Manju Rani:Delight For India As Manju Rani Punches Her Way Into World Championship Final, Is Assured Of At Least A Silver
text:
Delight For India As Manju Rani Punches Her Way Into World Championship Final, Is Assured Of At Least A Silver

Delight For India As Manju Rani Punches Her Way Into World Championship Final, Is Assured Of At Least A Silver

After Mary Kom's loss earlier in the day, Indian fans had something to cheer at the World Boxing Championships as Manju Rani sealed her place in the 48kg final.

Twitter

Manju defeated Raksat Chuthamat 4-1 in the semis. She was already assured of a medal and now has a shot at gold while a silver minimum is guaranteed.

This is her first world event and what a way to start. A gold will really be something.

Twitter

Don't Miss 30.8 K SHARES 17.3 K SHARES 475 SHARES 189 SHARES 8 K SHARES

Mary bowed out with bronze, her 8th world medal which is a record among women and men overall.
